tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE player_progress (
    player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_name VARCHAR(50),
    game_level INT,
    points INT,
    last_played_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE player_profile (
  player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  player_name VARCHAR(50),
  game_level INT,
  coins INT
)

CREATE TABLE player_inventory (
  player_id INT REFERENCES player_profile(player_id),
  item_id INT,
  quantity INT,
  is_equipped BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE player_inventory (
  inventory_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  player_id INT,
  item_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  item_quantity INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES players(player_id)
);

CREATE TABLE player_stats (
  stats_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  player_id INT,
  health INT,
  experience INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES players(player_id)
);

CREATE TABLE players (player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
player_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
player_level INT NOT NULL,
player_score INT NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE games (game_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
game_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
game_genre VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
release_date DATE NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE player_progress (progress_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
player_id INT NOT NULL,
game_id INT NOT NULL,
level_reached INT NOT NULL,
score INT NOT NULL,
UNIQUE (player_id, game_id));

CREATE TABLE player_inventory (inventory_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
player_id INT NOT NULL,
item_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
quantity INT NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE achievements (achievement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
achievement_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
points INT NOT NULL,
player_id INT NOT NULL,
game_id INT NOT NULL);
